title: GD I have a date tonight...
body:
Like seriously?! WTF?! Me?! This usually doesn't happen. I'm taking him to the movies, we're going to see The Lady in the Van. Looks funny. But seriously, this is like tearing the fabric of reality. Why the fuck do I have a date?

Will post more about it later...

I think I'll dress up
http://orig00.deviantart.net/b4d8/f/2015/260/a/5/cloudchaser_the_altaria_by_tomboyishsoniclover-d99y153.png
